body:

Well... look no further, you can read it here... 👇

Disgusting

Also there is Racist bait, ugly bastards, drugs, blackmail, kidnapping, threats, rape, gangbang, hypnosis, bullying and immoral stuff in NTR but these cucks LOVE it so obviously, they are very dirty minded, corrupted and absolutely disgusting. Normal people act normal (getting triggered). You pathetic cucks don't have the right to criticize normal people. Enjoy looking at your partners with these dirty corrupted NTR thoughts. Btw I am not trying to start a war, just trying to remind your pathetic cuck life. Whether it is true or not, you know it best. Find Jesus or Buddha. Seriously.

Also about hating Women cause of NTR, I don't know. But I am pretty sure that women are treated like plaything, shameless, worthless, possession, dirty and unfaithful in every NTR. So that guys obviously think like that and said it. He is not wrong actually. Incels who thinks all women are just bitches  VS Simps that got cucked so hard. Lmao

Pretty big words coming from all these cucks lol. Just like you guy cucks said "don't read it if you hate it", you guy cucks should just ignore hate comments cause they are immature and easilty triggered due to cheating and NTR. But cucks acting like they are proud of it, I have not seen this pathetic displays for a while. You guys should be ashamed of having your balls. You put Male gender to shame *facepalm*
Fortune favors the bold.
Fuck! This is cruel, but I came two times.
Actually, reading this merely reinforces the confirmation bias that women are enslaved by pleasure, which trumps emotional bonds. So yea, don't put yourself in the cuck's position
@ゆりゆり, Yes mate, you definitely hit the point.

The author need to make another series like this, or a side story starring Makiko-senpai or he could do Chapter 4. Can someone edit page 24 and make look like the guy cum inside her. I badly want to see Makiko getting creampied. Haha

@Prf.NTR >the twittards was very angry abt that< Which is utterly retarded if you ask me. CLEARLY, they only want the comment section back just so they can hate and flame on NTR/UB tags (and sometimes loli if they feel like it). I mean, you don't see this much of activity on wholesome vanilla crap doujins or even properly constructed stories like the Manhwa comics (even if they have NTR too lol!). You mainly only see them commenting on doujins like these just so they can be toxic whiny little bitches that are butthurt of the fact that plenty of upcoming/pro artists are drawing NTR/UB stuff instead of more vanilla trash garbage for them to coom-sume and feel better about themselves. It's just sad. It's just REAL sad, fam. @sky329 Same. I'd say they should disable it and let the favorite button do all the talking if all these stupid fuckers are here to ONLY flame/spite the genre. I bet they are the same kinda retards that "hate" isekai genre overall and yet still consume them...

@sky329, they did it before, bc Nhentai comment section is one of the most toxic comment section (until these days), but the twittards was very angry abt that, so they had to enable it again. And as you notice, Nhentai didn't use any online platform for the comment section like Disqus or something related to it, due to toxicity.
I wish comment section just disabled for eternity

holy mother fcking cow, what the hell happened in comment right here?, i don't care what you want to intended in here but, for love of god sake, please don't start fetish war kay?, i hate some retarded and butt hurt vanilla fag that always comment I hate NTR doujin while still open it and read it, like for real? look at the tag and don't complain and start skip it, if you attracted by the art go on but please don't bitching around, let the people enjoy their stuff, it's embarrassment this kind of people always ruin other people joy while also tarnishing the group they hop in, as vanilla lover i don't mind if people like this kind of stuff and i respect it, as long as they not choke me this kind of doujin any where i respect them
@Knightmaire231, don't waste your effort and time on typing a "facts" for them to understand what we really see when we're reading doujins like this. Bc their narrow brain wouldn't understand.

@kcjpunk, Bruhhh if a person loves Ntr means they hate woman? Geez what kind of fvked belief is that. If hating woman is that Easy, then killing a woman is much more easier (if only it's that easy). You dimwits who can't separate a fiction from reality are the real incels that keeps living inside your delusional fantasies, hoping that one day "Ohh My future life will gonna be like this wholesome doujin". Geez, dimwits nowadays is sure afraid to face reality and they ended up seeing a fictional work as their own reality

@Salman Rushdie
𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐬𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐢𝐬𝐧'𝐭 𝐝𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐦𝐮𝐜𝐡 𝐭𝐨 𝐝𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐥𝐥 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐧𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐍𝐓𝐑 𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐟𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐡 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐬 𝐰𝐡𝐨 𝐡𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐰𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐧.
Each and every time folks, there is someone who is stupid enough to conflate hatred with kink.
But I get you, the people who hate on this are mostly the ones who couldn't understand why their women cheated or left them for another man who wasn't "all that". And those guys look like you!

But don't worry, I was in that camp for some time too. Couldn't comprehend why would they do this to me. Until I started understanding how they move in this world. And you know what, I became the ones who cucks (intentionally or unintentionally) the boyfriends/husbands.
How can you hate what you understand!? That's crazy!!!
But people like you do! Projecting your ideology and morality onto them thinking that you and they are the same. And when they show you the reality, you start hating.
If u come here to shit on ntr doujins i hope baba fks ur mom

Putting aside who loves or hate women more, it's obvious when NTR hating vanillafags show up to troll. If you white knights really are that bitter and butthurt about NTR that you have to vent your frustrations towards random strangers in a hentai comment section, perhaps consider not being such a simp, and you might end up living happier lives.

People respond negatively to those betas because nobody likes whiny little bitches" Damn finally, I didn't expect someone to understand why most of us Ntr fans keeps saying "if you don't like it the don't read it".... you have my respect mate.

It's okay to dislike NTR. Besides the gems, most NTR being uploaded are crap anyways. Same with Vanilla. Not every doujinshi is good. On the flip side, there are the NTR haters who keep bitching in comments about how much they hate NTR, simply because. People respond negatively to those betas because nobody likes whiny little bitches.
wwhat a fcking trash, if you draw ntr it should be bigger dick  lol,

I see a lot of comments on NTR doujins saying that if we don't like ntr then we shouldn't read it. You see, I dislike NTR but like many others, I still read it from that to time. The reason for that is quite simple, and i believe it also applies to other users that dislike the genre but still read them.

We are searching for the very few hidden gems, legendary NTR doujins where the protagonist cuts his losses, admits that the girl is a whore and moves on. On even rarer occasion you might find a doujin where it eventually ends well for the MC and bad for both the thief and the whore.

As long as there is a chance of finding a doujin with such ending, i'll keep digging into the sea of sadness that is the NTR genre.
Soo many snowflakes crying because this is ntr. Just don't read it if it hurts your fragile soul
Fap to ntr sht

This MC like most other NTR MCs should just cut ties with the whore and the bastard that "stole" her. Find a way to move if he has to...or go full scorched earth if he has the means. Either way, he needs to just stop associating with her. Tell her "yes" when she asked him if he's ignoring her and just walk away. She doesn't actually care for him, anyway.
@quanbe The bully isn't a chad...he's a douche taking advantage of people in vulnerable situations. Funny how you idiots think rapists and blackmailers are "chad" or "alpha"... :/
